import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { getUserDetails, logout } from "../Redux/Action/UserAction"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const Header = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const history = useHistory(); const userDetails = useSelector((state) => state.userDetails); const { userInfo } = userDetails; const cartList = useSelector((state) => state.cartList); const { cartLists } = cartList; const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()); }; useEffect(() => { dispatch(getUserDetails()); }, [dispatch]); const [search, setSearch] = useState(); const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (search.trim()) { history(`?search=${search}`); } else { } }; return (
{/* Top Header */}
